attributes.action: Make cannabis legal for recreational use for ages 21+
attributes.additional_details: Research has shown that cannabis has helped people with a number of medical issues, such as chronic pain.
attributes.background: I want the Government to legalize and tax cannabis for people aged 21 and over. This could help the government make lots of money and could result in much less crime.
